pullrequest.title: Made stepping boxes into bridge; confirmed that it's walkable

content.raw: Testing was ok for this scenario. I was able to move the robot across the bridge. It falls if one of the feet go out of the bridge. Sensor data produced and visualized in rviz looks reasonable for both, laser and cameras.
content.html: Testing was ok for this scenario. I was able to move the robot across the bridge. It falls if one of the feet go out of the bridge. Sensor data produced and visualized in rviz looks reasonable for both, laser and cameras.

pullrequest.title: Made stepping boxes into bridge; confirmed that it's walkable

content.raw:
Changed the bridge to make it a bit more challenging. Keyboard teleoping across is likely not to work, however an open loop trajectory can be created such that walking across is possible.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e9bFs0BoDmY&feature=youtu.be

Changed the bridge to make it a bit more challenging. Keyboard teleoping across is likely not to work, however an open loop trajectory can be created such that walking across is possible.
